title: Cant Login to the riot support
body: So, on the top right of the riot support page, there is a button that says 'Sign In'. I click this button, type in my information, then it says "You have been signed out". I don't want to sign out, I want to sign in so I can submit a ticket.... Ive tried multiple browsers, so that is not the issue.

replies.body:
Most likely cause is that you don't have a verified e-mail on your account.  I see that you've requested the e-mail verification but haven't completed it.  Not sure if you have access to the e-mail on your account or not, but if you do, go ahead and complete the e-mail verification process then you should be able to log in normally :D

Let me know if you run into any problems with this step!

> Maltagigi 

I'm sorry !  I said I would try to look this problem up and I just don't even know how to begin..

Good Luck.  !  Still here though.
Can anyone Help here ?  This may be a legit Q. Help ??
